food.name: Goody's
food.description: Best known for authentic South-of-the-Border style food, like big burritos, Baja salad bowls, and other Mexican entrees. Not in the mood for Latin food? The deli features a distinct variety of fresh artisan sandwiches and refreshing sides, as well as an outdoor walk-up window for coffee drinks.
food.address: Goody's Place and Market, Voigt Lane, La Jolla, CA 92037, United States

food.name: Ocean View Terrace
food.description: OceanView Terrace welcomes guests to enjoy a delicious array of a la carte specials while relaxing on the outdoor terrace. Choose from piping hot made-to-order specials, fresh salads, in-house baked goods, soft-serve, and more
food.address: Oceanview Terrace Restaurant, La Jolla, CA 92037, United States

food.name: Sixty Four Degrees
food.description: Enjoy five stations featuring burgers, shakes, tossed salads, rotisserie specials and a few surprises you will have to come and see to enjoy!
food.address: Sixty Four Degrees, Revelle College, 9500 Gilman Drive 0351, La Jolla, CA 92093-0351

drink.name: Mandeville Coffee Cart - The Art of Espresso
drink.description: The Art of Espresso is a friendly gathering place for faculty, staff, and students alike. Outdoor patio seating and an indoor quiet space offer a relaxing, comfortable atmosphere for socializing or studying.
drink.address: Art of Espresso, 9500 Gilman Drive, La Jolla, CA 92093, United States

drink.name: Cups Outdoor Café
drink.description: Cups Outdoor Café serves organic and free-trade coffee, blended drinks, pastries, smoothies, sandwiches, salads, desserts, and vegetarian specialties.

drink.name: Perks Coffee Shop
drink.description: Perks serves beverages (including coffee from Barefoot Roasters), healthy sandwiches, snacks, and specialty chocolates.
drink.address: University of California San Diego Bookstore, 9500 Gilman Dr, La Jolla, CA 92093

Goody's.name: Burrito
Goody's.description: Mexican style burrito coming with your choice of Meat, Rice, Beans, Lettuce, Salsa, Guac, Cheese, Sour Cream, and Chipioltle Mayo

Goody's.name: Burrito Bowl
Goody's.description: Basically the tastiness of a burrito in a bowl
